name: Mad Zombies Extreme
description:
Mad Zombies Extreme - try to get through endless hordes of zombies and find out where deadly virus came from. Destroy monsters! Fight for the survival in the world of this game full of zombies. Find people survived after zombie apocalypse and rescue them. Penetrate secret laboratories of crazy scientists and other horrible places. Complete various tasks and get rewards.

Game features:
-Many interesting levels
-Wide weapon arsenal
-Different game modes
-Huge zombie bosses
